BlackLight® is the world’s first search tool for finding Black-Owned businesses.

Download BlackLight® today to harness the power of your dollars and redirect them to benefit Black and minority-owned businesses. Because where you shop has the power to transform commerce as we know it.

How does it work?
It’s as simple as downloading our plugin from the Chrome store (luckily, you’re in the right place!). Install the plugin on your Chrome browser, then search like you normally would. If Black-owned businesses match your search, you’ll see them in your results! Our database is growing all the time, but if we missed one, you’ll be able to let us know right from your browser.

Why should I shop Black-Owned?
There are so many reasons to shop Black-owned. From using your dollars to help close the wealth-gap, to discovering new products, services and entrepreneurs, shopping Black-owned contributes to the financial health of communities and builds bridges between people.

I’m a Black-owned business. How can I join?
We’re so glad to have you! Adding your business to the BlackLight® database will allow consumers find you more easily and corporations looking for minority suppliers to find you faster.  Sign up here to join the BlackLight™ network.

By using the BlackLight® browser extension, you agree to BlackLight®’s terms and conditions. (https://shop4betterworld.org/terms-of-use)
